### 1.2 Data's Point of View


# Load Library Package
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)
```




```{r}
suicide <- read.csv("data_input/who_suicide_statistics.csv")
glimpse(suicide)
```

```{r}
df <- suicide %>%
  mutate_if(is.character,as.factor) 
df1 <- df %>% mutate(suicides_no =ifelse(is.na(suicides_no), yes = 0, no = suicides_no))
df2<- df1 %>% mutate(population =ifelse(is.na(population), yes = mean(df1 %>% selmean(population)), no = population))
str(df2)
```

```{r}
summary(df2)
```
suicide per million
